response.overview: 19-year-old Billy Lynn is brought home for a victory tour after a harrowing Iraq battle. Through flashbacks the film shows what really happened to his squad – contrasting the realities of war with America's perceptions.
response.tagline: To walk the path of a hero, you have to see how it all began.
response.title: Billy Lynn's Long Halftime Walk

titles.title: Долгий путь Билли Линна в перерыве футбольного матча
